page.title: 14How I spent May-Day Holiday
page.content: My May-Day Bank Holiday 1985 by Jonathan Reynolds. 08.30 Got up with my sister.Put on TV. 09.00 My parents got up and made breakfast. I had Weetabix. 09.30 Went on my bike round the block seventy-two times. 10.00 Read about the Faulklands war. 10.15 Went a ride on my bike. 11.30 Had chips, sausages and beans. 12.00 Watched the News on TV. 12.30 Went outside to look round. 13.00 Went to my friend Jamie's house on my bike. 13.15 Started playing computer games with Jamie. Played on the computer all afternoon. 17.00 Had egg sandwiches and lemon meringue pie for tea. 18.00 Went home and watched TV until 21.30 I went to bed.
